title: Thomson OATHPRO Series 108 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV with Dolby Digital Plus & DTS TruSurround  (43 OATHPRO 2000)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Unit(1 LED TV,1 REMOTE,1 MANUAL,2 AAABATTERY WITH WALL MOUNTING
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MP4, MPEG, MPG, MKV, AVI, FLV, ASF
product_specification.Other Video Features: 4K HDR 10, MEMC 60 Hz, 10 Bit Display, HLG, Cast, YouTube 4K Stream
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MP3, MPEG1/2/2.5, AAC, HEAAC, ASF, WMA
product_specification.Other Audio Features: 6 Sound Mode (Standard, music, news, movie, game, user), Sound Output Device (TV Speaker, ARC, S/PDIF)
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Disney+ Hotstar, Sony Liv, Zee5, Voot, HBO, Eros Now, MX Player TV, Alt Balaji and Many More
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Android TV 9.0, Google Play Store with 5000+ apps, Chromecast built-in, Google Assistant, LIVE TV Channels, 20+ content partners
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Google Assistant, Lag free performance, Large memory, Bluetooth, WiFi, Voice Controlled remote
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product & 6 Months on Accessories
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: The Product is Not Used According to Instructions given in the Instruction Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature is Made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Installation or Repair Work is Carried Out by Persons or Agency Other than Authorized by the Company. Site (Premises Where the Product is Kept) Conditions that do not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. Original Serial Number is Removed, Obliterated or Altered from the Machine or Cabinet. Defects due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightning, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to Service Centre or Purchaser's Residence. The Warranty does not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag Etc). Dust appearing on television panel after 10 days of usage, mentioned in the Operating Instruction Manual Supplied with this Product or Any Cosmetic Parts
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. The installation will be done within 2 to 3maximum Business days of delivery of the TV. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on the wall mount or on the table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost (Only first installation is free of cost). The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested (Wall mounted mode is recommended for better sound experience), Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked Demonstration of features and settings, Quick run-through on how to operate the TV.

product_description.Great Picture Quality: Boasting 4K UHD resolution and technologies such as HDR10, this 108 cm (43) TV will leave you speechless with its visuals. Get set to enjoy realistic and vivid pictures on-screen with enhanced depth, texture, and natural colours.
product_description.MEMC Technology: This TV’s Motion Estimation, Motion Compensation (MEMC) technology will ensure smoother frames, even for fast-moving scenes, by minimizing lag. Oh, and with the help of its 10-bit display and a refresh rate of 60 Hz, you can enjoy a wonderful gaming experience on this TV.

Initial impressions after one day usage:

Lived up to specifications and expectations

The best feature of this TV is ofcourse its Display...colors and viewing angles are great...watching 4k content is so much fun and it's doing really good even with upscaling normal low resolution content/local cable connections.

Sound is great ...30 watt speakers gives solid output...maintains very good clarity even at high volumes..dont expect home theatre experience though.

Performance is smooth for now and didnt face any issues with connectivity.

It would have been best if it had 16 gb storage...but that was not a concern for me, since my priority was quality of sound and display as I took for my parents at home and they dont download too many apps.

Overall really happy with my decision for now...decided to buy it after lot of research and it didn't disappoint

This is my first Smart TV and my detailed review below:

I bought this Thomson TV 4 days before after a long research on Internet & discussion with family and friends. I was worried about my TV experience in low budget since I cannot afford LG, SONY and SAMSUNG high end TVs. Now, I can confidently say the picture and sound quality of Thomson TV I have recently bought is awesome. Flipkart delivery is really fast and also demo & installation is too good. TV connectivity is also good. if u think buy new tv then u can definitely go with this Thomson 50 inch TV.

This product is superb & fantastic, very clear picture quality, fast connectivity, even on mobile hotspot its runs smoothly, not hanging after connecting internet. After buing, this product, I realy realised that, on investing this much money, is realy value for money. If guys want to purchase on this amount can go ahead.

Great on Paper but not so in reality. The biggest disappointment this tv gave was with its internet capability. Wifi is unusable. Max 6 Mbps on wifi so forget streaming 4k, even HD is out of reach. Tried ethernet connection and even that was bad. Kept getting 50% of my bandwidth at max while on other tvs reached 100% speed. So if you want this tv for streaming on android os this is not such a good idea. Getting a fire tv stick might help. Its remote is poorly designed. A bulky unresponsive garbage. It connects via bluetooth to the tv and there is no Ir blaster. Sometimes i am unable to turn on the tv. Other times it takes multiple commands on a single press and sometimes none. Sound quality is below average and frankly quite low sometimes. Most audio formats don't get amplified properly. Being an Ips pannel the blacks and contrast is not great although picture quality in bright scenes is good. The android OS has not been properly optimised and customized by thomson. The menu items are sometimes not visible due to the background and are small. Settings optimization is limited for many things like picture and sound quality with just basic options to choose from.
Get this tv if its similarly priced alternatives are not available.

2) go to connection settings and turn on and off wifi

Casting is little bit difficult as we need to have Google home app and then we need to cast from there. It took lot of time to sort the things .
Unlike normal screencast option we need to connect to same WiFi network and need to cast from there . This means both phone and TV need to connect to same network which means u can't cast with internet from your mobile

This review is one month post usage. This is for anyone who is searching for an android smart tv and is confused about this brand, then the intention of my post is to clear the air. Thomson is a known European brand relaunched in India. THIS PRODUCT IS VALUE FOR MONEY. At this price one could not find a better product. Picture quality, finish, sound, remote are class apart. I strongly recommend this product to everyone. No one will regret it.

The Thomson tv is great value for money tv.
They have cut cost at the correct places.
The main component of the tv is display, then sound.

Display is very good. The 43 inches model has around 500 NITs of brightness. The 53 inch model has 555 NITs of brightness you can definitely see increase the brightness. For HDR content extra brightness test make a good difference. The sound is decent. It gets little loud, but detail and bass is not very great. Pretty decent sound overall. The panel is supposedly from Samsung.Thats what the customer care representative said but I am not sure. I am pleasantly surprised with the contrast. The static contrast is not mentioned, but in my opinion it's very good.the panel is little reflective but that is something you can pass off in this price range.you could see something nothing in the corners especially if you open YouTube and on the grey background if you see in the corners, it is little dark. But it's not a deal breaker,generally backlighting is good. They don't tell how many local dimming zones are there though. But blooming as pretty much in control.

Connectivity/ram/processor:
There are some issues with respect to connectivity.everytime when you start the TV you have to switch on and off the WLAN in the TV menu. Hopefully they fix it quickly with an update. RAM is 1GB and the storage as 8GB. The general interface is little slow but manageable. as a suggestion if you feel the interfaces slow you can always put a Android tv box like mi tv for example and you can fix that.

Conclusion:

if you are buying a TV for your parents this is really good option. Overall the display is very good and sound is decent,
And the performance is decent. Design is also good with the thin bezels.it looks very premium. For the price, it's an excellent option, compared to VU, TCL, Nokia.

Manufactures , please start mentioning proper tv specs when you release a TV, like color gamut, static contrast, local dimming zones, peak brightness.

Ordered this TV on 18th Jul evening @5 and got it delivered the next day by 12 pm.. Great job by Flipkart for quick delivery. Got call for installation on the same day but I asked them to come the next day. Jeeves did good job with a friendly person guiding the installation.

1. The TV looks good with very thin bazzels... I've been using mi TV so long and this looks much better.
2. Picture quality is very good with hdr10, dolby vision and memc..
3. Sound could have been better, I did not feel much bass and I think I should not expect much with a 30w speaker.
4. Connectivity is good and straightforward... Did not face any issues so far... I've connected my sound bar and works absolutely fine.
5. Remote is big but has all in it...
6. This TV is perfect value for money with good display and descent sound... Just short of storage if u wanna store more otherwise I feel this RAM is also sufficient for daily use.

Using the TV for a week now
With official Android TV OS and support for Netflix and Amazon Prime and other apps from playstore, a perfect package at a reasonable cost but ... but the hardware specifications such as RAM and Internal Storage are very less as compared to other competitors around there. Only 4gb is available out of 8, so can't keep many apps and games on the TV. Less RAM makes my TV a micromax moment😓. I liked the metal stand btw. The wall mount is not that great. Bezel less design is fabulous. The TV is OATH PRO but they have actually lowered the RAM and Internal Storage.🤣.

Software 💯

Hardware 0

Probably the TV gonna last only 5 to 6 years.

P.S. no 3.5 mm headphone jack

My first impression about this TV is great.
What I liked:
1) Picture quality is amazing because before purchasing this TV, I have checked LG, Panasonic, Philips and MI TV in the nearby shop. So comparing to these TV's, Thomson TV picture quality is top notch.
2) Sound output is also great. It is loud enough.
3) TV user interface and remote buttons are quite good and easy to navigate.
4) for the price of 25k it is surely a value for money.
5) TV is very light weight

What I didn't like:
1) I can't connect my laptop wirelessly, like how we cast our mobile.
2) There is no aux out or HDMI out port (this TV has all input ports). Even there is no RCA out. I use to connect my old TV to home theatre with either of this. But now, the only way i can connect is through digital audio cable and that cable.
3) Installation was done by jeevs pvt ltd. But the guy who came to install this TV was so pathetic and very rude. He neither gave any demo nor answered to my questions. He was not a trained technician. On top of this, he was asking money to come to our home for installation (but it is written by company that installation of TV is completely free of cost for the first time).

So for this reason i gave one star less.

I bought this product on Aug 6, 2020. It was delivered on time and installation also happened on time. However, within the first week the remote stopped working. I reached out to Thomson Customer Care and they directed me to the Spares Team.

Spares team asked me to make a video that the remote is not working. I did ask my parents who stay in a different city to record a video and share it with the spares team.

Now the spares team wants me to ship the defective video and then they will check and send me a new one.

Never knew I will have to go through so much hassle for a defective remote. I am really not happy with the service given by the spares team of Thomson TV.

This is a feedback for Flipkart also that if they are selling any product they should have these kinda issues sorted with the seller company. As Flipkart is the authorized seller of Thomson TV.

Still waiting for the issue to be resolved. I am really not interested in spending more money to ship the remote and that too there is no guarantee that they will send a new one.

I ordered this TV after checking out a few videos on YouTube including a factory tour of Super Plastronics which convinced me to order this. The first TV which I received had some discoloration - visible if you watch sports a lot e.g. cricket or football. I raised a complaint, Jeeves handled the call, checked the TV and confirmed the replacement and replacement was done in about a week. I am very satisfied on how this was handled seamlessly both from Flipkart as well as from Thomson India, though I did have to check twice on the status of my complaint ticket with Flipkart.

Coming to the TV itself, I changed from a CRT TV so I am no expert on the color reproduction accuracy but the screen is very clear even from about 15-20 feet away and sound is quite loud and clear even at low volumes , I haven't felt a need for a sound bar. The interfaces provided are contemporary and the Google Assistant is a boon, we don't feel a need to operate any other key !!

Overall, I think it is a great product at this price point (now with even lower price ).

Detailed Review after 6 months of usage:
Picture quality is amazing & truly 4K. I read some reviews saying they faced lag while playing 4K videos but I encountered no issues like that. Must be broadband issue.
Bluetooth connectivity works just fine.
HDMI CABLE & ARC works absolutely fine.
Remote is very detailed & helpful.
Screen mirroring/cast does show lag a bit which can be improved.
The sound is enough for a hall of 20*15.
I faced issues with Google Assistant. But as informed by the Thomson suport team, I had to painfully do a factory reset & then it works again like a charm.
Overall - WORTH EVERY PENNY SPENT ON IT.

After 4 months of usage
What i Like:
- Good & Bright display
- Pretty decent audio quality - Loud & Clear
- Checked compatability - Dolby Audio, HDR - Works with notification on top
- Apps compatability with 4K - Prime Video,
- Netflix not checked yet, but should support 4K. But unknown about Dolby Vision.
- Chromecast works good for streaming apps like Youtube, Primevideo, prime music, Spotify
- Using a pendrive as an internal shared storage, works well for storing offline content
- Updated to Android 10!!

What could be better
- Chromecast with apps like MX player, VLC doesn;t work well, huge lag or struggles to play the content stored in mobile to TV

What I don't like
Don't expect pure black in the panel, there are few light leak while the screen in dark or black scene. Easily noticeable when ur room is dark and playing title card with black background and text only.
But u cant obseve them in bright light condition.

Also the Thomson customer care guy calls and asks to give 5 star rating for an extended 3 months warranty. I don't like this strategy.

Your hands can't leave reach the USB or HDMI ports for any connectivity...

Apart from that the TV is very good...

At this price range the picture quality is awesome. Better than Sony, MI brand TV's. Honest review after 4 months of usage.

Pros

1. Colour reproduction
It has 10bit panel which means it can deliver 1 billion colours where other tvs in the price segment offers only 8bit panel which can deliver only 16million colours.

2. Display
Dolby vision, 4kHDR, HDR10, HLG enabled so the viewing of Dolby vision and HDR video content is wonderful. 400 nits brightness is a plus.

3. Audio
DTS, DOLBY enabled.
30W speaker output delivers crystal clear sound.

4.Connectivity

Chromecast enabled and it works well.
eARC HDMI and optical output available so can connect soundbar to enjoy HD audio.
Bluetooth 5.0

Cons

1.Dual band wifi is missing though we can stream 4k videos.
2. Boot time - initial boot time requires atleast 10 secs.
3. WCG is missing.

Overall its a best buy for this price range.

This product had value for money. I used this for about 3 months now. Picture quality is decent and so is the sound. There are not many customisation available for this television like custom brightness, sound equaliser etc. One issue observed was with the remote, where it stopped working after 2 months. I had to initiate a support request, make a video to prove that it is not working and had to courier the remote to Delhi on my expense since there was no support person available to visit home and do this. Feedback time from the support team is 2 to 3 days for each mail and after couple of follow ups I got the new working remote. Support team provided alternate option with a mobile application to control television in the meantime.

1. Picture quality is ok but on my panel there are few spots where the pixels are dull they are emitting light but are not consistent with the pixels around it
2. Sound quality is ok for watching YouTube serials but for music and movies you need a good sound system or a soundbar for the bass
3. Built in wifi is only 2.4ghz which is a bummer as it is mostly sufficient but 5ghz would have been better buffer times are present but not too concerned about it
4. No headphone jack is a very big hit as the only other option to add sound equipment is the optical in port or bluetooth
5. I didn't receive any extra accessories like hdmi cable, screws for the wall mount and spacers for the tv which is not a good thing
6. MEMC is just a gimmick it doesn't work at all and if it is there i can't find it
7. Refresh rate is 🧐 very sketchy its not that smooth for a 60hz panel and in youtube it doesn't mention 60 like my phone does

Purchased this Tv in July '20. I hesitated to write a review early on as i wanted to wait and analyse its performance. One major issue i had was with wifi. Every time, the electricity was out, and then on switching on, i had to reconnect to wifi from settings, else YouTube, Prime etc doesnt work. Surprisingly Netflix works without reconnecting which shows no issues with internet/wifi router at home. Anyways getting Ethernet Lan cable solved my issue.
Next came to the TV remote. It stopped working. Ofcourse i thought it was just the battery and purchased new. But unfortunately it wasnt the issue. I wrote to the customer care who transferred the case to their Spares division. I was "demanded" for a video of the TV remote not working, so they could initiate it to be shipped to your location. I thought it was straight forward. After sending the video, the Spares department stopped responding to my email follow up. You guessed it right, i still haven't got the TV remote or any calls from the Spares team for a replacement. I lost hope, so back on Flipkart trying to find a compatible remote to meet my needs.
On the positive note, i love the TV, its price and the clarity it has to offer. Now waiting to see what other surprises come my way!

Overall very satisfied with the product and it's performance.
Pros:
•Considering the price you wouldn't get whole bunch of features which this company provides.
•The picture quality is amazing and viewing angles are superb which never dissatisfy you while let you watch from any angle.
•3 HDMI, 2 USB,1 Optical, 1 Ethernet, 1 AV ports let you manage your device in every aspect.
•TV is very light weight and you can install it easily anywhere let it be Table or on wall.
•It runs smoothly on latest Android version and having latest security patch updates.
•Remote is awesome as it is connected by Bluetooth so you need not to point the remote to TV every time you wish to operate like those having IR blaster.
•Less bezel gives it a perfect and attractive look.

cons:
• RAM and Storage should have been high.
•Only 2.5G WiFi supported.
• HDMI cable and Bluetooth connected with external speakers getting disconnected on their own. While connected to HDMI many times I've to reinsert it again and again to let it work.

But overall experience is amazing and you would not regret considering its price point. The same features in other companies might cost you 30+

○ The performance is fast and simply amazing as i expected it to be. Loved the bezel-less design.
○ Picture quality is great and the sound quality is the best feature(no need of home theater).
○ Connectivity is also good wired(no lag when using hdmi cable) and wireless(no lagging faced when connected mobile using Samsung smart view but when using some other app gives a little lag).
During screen casting of laptop using Google Chrome no lagging is faced.
○ The remote connectivity is great and also the voice search works perfectly(no issues faced).
○ No issues faced when usb is connected. Works very well.

Overall it is a great product worth purchasing.
Happy to have it.

Hi guys...my old tv stopped working in early days of lockdown...since then i was planning to buy one tv...but atlast i waited for BB days and got this wonderful 43" Thomson oathpro TV which i had wishlisted since its launched. Orginal price was 24999 but got a very good deal in BB at only 21599/-

Got delivered one day before estimated time. Installation on same day in late evening with very professional work.

Picture and sound quality is much much better than expected.

Connectivity is good... though i had to purchased one extender because my router is placed very far from the tv and loses its access and on the extender it gives very good non stop picture quality...quite happy about it.

Remote is fast.

--Cannot connect to home theatre via AV and aux cable and can connect only with BT....as my Home theater is very old without bluetooth. So i purchased one blutooth adapter and got connected to my HT. Only thing is bluetooth adapter does not connect automatically everytime (may be BT adapter fault). But tv speaker sound is so good that at a time u will no need home theatre.

One thing i m unhappy about is that in some apps like Prime, mxTV and sometimes in hotstar when i do fwd and backward in videos...it behaves abnormally and than i had to exit that video as well as apps to resume normally thats irritating and no such abnormality found in NETFLIX app it works like charm.

But in all i got a very good deal and very good tv.

I have purchased 55 inch Thomson TV after observing the reviews . Company has given 1.5 yrs warrenty including 6 months additional warranty.After usage of 11 months observed a line on top of the screen. Initially I thought it is a minor. After a lapse of 1 month I observed that the length of the line is getting increased. Then I took a snap and sent to Thomson customer support by mail. No responce. Then I have contacted customer support by phone call. They have informed that it's a screen problem and TV has to be replaced by additional payment of 80% of the present cost of TV. Then I have questioned about the warranty. They have informed that warranty will not cover the picture problem. So, I am advising all not to purchase this TV as there is no proper service. It is advisable to go for a branded TV even more cost also bcz it will give longer life and good customer service. The customer service is very very poor.

Wrting this detailed review after one-week of usage.
I was confused with Nokia, Motorola and Thomson Tv. After a lot of comparison, I decided to go with Thomson. Before purchasing my main concerns on this TV was on 1.75 GB ram and Singke band WIFI.
But during my one week usage I found no lag in streaming 4K videos in youtube, Netflix and Prime videos. No connectivity issues on 2.4 GHz wifi also.
Though it is Android 9, on the day of installation itself I received an update to Android 10.
Pros
Picture Quality - Excellent
Sound Quality - Very Good with 30W sound for 17 x 20 living room
Connectivity - Excellent
Delivery and Installation - Very Good
OS - ANDROID 10
Look - Premium look with basel less design
User-friendly remote with google assistant.

Cons
Very light wall mount stand which I resolved in just Rs.600/-

Overall good Indian product backed with French legacy at a very reasonable price. I got the deal for 25k for 55 inch TV on Diwali sale and I opted this TV with a three-year complete protection plan.

HIGHLY RECOMMENDING THIS PRODUCT who need a quality tv at a very good price.

All rounder :) i had lot of confusion in buying this , Either should i buy this 65 inch or motorola 55 inch TV. But glad I chose this.

++
1. Price
2. Build quality - 65 inch had screen protector installed. Who would have guessed.
3. Display - Trust Me for normal TV viewing, and if you dont research in colors , this TV is king.
4. Android 10
5. Audio is seriously good for casual viewing experience but for movies simple sound bar should help.
6. IPS instead VA is always good to have.
Con
Yes in 2020 wifi support only 2.4 hz ? Biggest crime.
Internal memory and RAM is okish for casual viewing.

Conclusion - if you are looking for a good big sized TV , with all fancy Dolby extensions, and with budget less than 60k , go for this blindly. You will be immensely satisfied with few savings on your name :)

Who ever thinking to buy thomson or kodak here is my experience.
I bought kodak 65inch ca model there are so many problems in it so returened and purchased thomson. Both have same specs and manufactured by same company SPPL.
Theoriticaly both tvs should perform the same but practically thomson is far better than kodak. here is my explination
- picture clarity both are same.
- color reproduction thomson is far better than kodak, I haven't though there would be such a difference.
- Sound much better than kodak
- operating system and UI much optimized than kodak
- Display in kodak i have draker corners , in thomson it is fine.
- Screen bleeding is common in all budeget tvs, it present in my kodak tv as well as thomson also but area of bleeding is more in kodak.
- Fit finish and design thomson has sleek slim and good look. but kodak is bulky and fit & finish not good.

I don't know whether i received defective piece from kodak or what but this the differece practically i noticed.
Now iam thinking i made good decision by returning Kodak tv.

Bought this TV after so many researcher and reviews. First thing is I wanted to buy a non-chinese TV. Then following are my preferences and I am completely satisfied

1. Good quality picture, even with SD channels. Because everyone can't afford HD channels it includes me. YouTube and primevideo movies are awesome with 480p resolution and HD is brilliant. 4k I haven't tried yet.
2. Good sound DTS, dolby available with 30W. What else we require? In this price range.
3. Connectivity, first it was bit difficult. After software update then it's good too.
4. Price, when it comes to price. It was 25k previously, however in October 2020 big billion days I got it at Rs 19,800. Also I took insurance for TV it may be better these days. Total 21800/-.

Finally ultimate buy for 43 inch 4k TV under this price. No second thought when you want to choose this.

I ordered the 55 inch version for 28.75k in BBD.

Pros:

1. Picture quality, sound quality is very good. Way beyond what I had expected given the price of the TV.

2. I didn't face any issues with connectivity, like a lot of people had mentioned. Chromecast works smoothly. I think if you have a router with good range then you won't have any issues with Wifi also.

3. Connected it to my tataSky and picture quality is super awesome. Though you would need an HDMI cable which is not included. Standard blue and yellow AV cables don't give that-good quality.

4. Also performance is more than enough for my usage. I just watch on tatasky and few other apps.

5. Storage could be less for someone who wants a lot of apps.

Cons:

1. I felt that the wall mount that came with the TV was not up to the mark. It was just a single rod. It was decent enough but I didn't feel that it could last for 4-6 years. So I bought a TV mount from the installation guy for 1600.

2. Start up time is a little long about 25-30 seconds.

P.S. Images are all taken from 4k videos.

Remote is excellent.

Must Have:- Bandwidth of 50 Mbps on your net connection. Fire tv 4k , Prime video 4k Content & for Apple Tv as all apple TV content is 4k. Netflix 4K subscription.

1. This has almost all features what we look for
2. If you ask for 8k, 5GHZ wifi support, then its not there
3. Sound quality is really soothing
4. It gets connected to my 100mbps broadband (not a optic fiber) connection (actual 40-50mbps) very easily. IF your TV doesn't get connected, runs slow then dont blame the TV blame your internet speed
5. If you are going for 55, 65 inch tV then I guess extended warranty is must. Value looks very high but i think these TVs last for 2-3 year smoothly then start giving you some issues, so better be safe and check for repair service they charge you very high. I've opted for it for three years
6. Google inbuilt voice assistant works smooth
7. With all Netflix, Prime, hotstar, YouTube platforms pre installed I'm not liking HD channel on DTH
8. So I think I 'll be spending on all these subscription too
9. I couldn't mirror my phone yet, shall try again
10.

I strongly recommend to all who loves big screen then go for it 55, 65,75 even if you've a small room.

I am writing this review after 3 weeks of usage.
Pros:
- Great picture quality for this price range. 4K videos play really well
- Smart TV that supports most of the OTT services that you will be using. Doesn't require you to use any FireStick or external streaming devices.
- Android 9 OS that allows all the play store apps and also side loading of apps
- 30W sound output is loud enough for a large living room
- In built Chromecast works great
- Good connectivity options
- Very easy to install and use. Installation service provided by Flipkart was quick and good.

Cons:
- Very slow boot time (takes more than 20-30 seconds)
- Very low internal storage
- The operating system is slow due to less powerful processor and less RAM but apps run fine.
- Google Assistant is slow in responding
- Although the sound is loud enough to listen to the music, you will find it difficult to hear dialogs clearly if the room is very large. Requires sound bar to be installed in such cases.
- Customer care is very slow in responding. Requires multiple follow ups.
- Product description claims that the TV supports AirPlay for ios devices. There is no inbuilt support. You need to download 3rd party Airscreen app from playstore to use Airplay. Advanced features for this app are Paid features.

Overall review - It is a great 4k TV to buy in this price range. Do not expect it to be similar to high range premium TVs.

Please note I'm a normal household and not a pro or a gamer. Reviewing based on my experience in the last two days.

Video quality is good it tried all the resolution up till 4k
Audio is loud enough but while watching movies, some time sound is too loud especially during songs and action sequences. This is irrespective of whether you are in the movie more or music mode.
Installation was done on the promised date but the service person changed the time thrice and was pushing to buy a stabilizer, though it was not required as per the Thompson contact.
Wifi doest support dual-band (5Ghz) and I don't have an issue, because TV is located close to the router and it is connected via ethernet cable.
The Remote is very handy with separate buttons for youtube and Prime video which I use most of the time and sensors are good enough( I tried at 25 feet distance from the TV).

To summarize, This TV solves the basic needs of home TV for its price, need to wait for long time performance and post-sales service feedback.

2. Connectivity - Some reviews mention connectivity issues, did not face any issues while connecting to wifi or switching wifi connections. HDMI and USB works well.
3. Speed - 1.75 GB ram is sufficient for watching TV and videos on you tube. I do not play any games so not an issue for me.
4. Audio - Probably the weakest feature in the TV. But acceptable quality.

If we compare this to the similar 50 In TVs from other brands; this is a great deal !

What we look in a Smart TV is Picture quality, sound quality, and speed and storage space.
This TV looks aesthetic and works superb so far. Here is my experience so far:

1. Picture quality- Its superb. Up-scaling is also great. Brightness is good. Black colour reproduction is good. However, little banding can be noted some times in blue and red colours.
2. Sound- Its awesome. Never heard such marvelous sound from a LED TV. Some songs and movies can be played at soud level 10-15. When you increase the sound above 50, your neighbors will dance.
3. Speed - Little slow in starting. It may be due to booting of the android system. Rest operating is fine. Connecting mobile with chromecast is good. When connected with Laptop via HDMI, screen was blinking. When connected laptop via chrome cast, few microsecond lag is there. I do not know if it is normal of all TVs.
4. Storage - Good if you not install to many apps and store video.

I bought a 50 inch TV for Rs 29000 and got it delivered two days before Vinayak Chathurthi. Next day, installation was done. It was raining hard on the day it was delivered the box became wet on one side and lyckily didn't damage TV. Flipkart needs to take good care of the items when delivering.
The picture quality looks good, sound is great and the remote is great, too. The remote is a bluetooth one so it can be used in any direction within certain distance from TV. TV comes with preinstalled apps such as prime, netflix, youtube etc., and you can install many apps from google play store.
I placed order for this TV (French technology, made in India) as I didn't want to spend a lot of money on most popular Korean and Japanese brands. Technology changes rapidly and the value depreciates too fast. Honestly, I was looking for a VU TV, but no stock anywhere and went for this TV. So far so good with the decision.
A few things that are of concern to me are:
1. It only has 1.75 GB RAM and 8 GB of storage.
2. It only has single band wifi (2.4 GHz). Having two band wifi helps playing 4k videos seamlessly. Whenever you connect to the smart features, you need to disconnect and connect to wifi manually. This is really annoying. You don't need to enter password, but disconnect and connect again.

About insrallation guy from jeeves:
He, Sampath Kumar, was horrible. He just came to install it and didn't explain anything neither about the remote nor about the TV. He didn't check any ports, if they were working fine. He came in the evening maybe tired, but it is his job to spend time with the clients to explain everything to the extent possible. Customer service should be top most priority in any business.
There is a free wall mount in the box, if you wanna mount it on a wall.
Soon after you buy the TV, you will get a call from the manufacturer of the TV for a screenshot of your review to get an additional warranty of 3 months. This is kind of luring customers to give a good review, I presume. That call didn't change my mind.
